Package brickdestroy.levels

Class SaveScores

java.lang.Object
brickdestroy.levels.SaveScores
public class SaveScores
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible for saving both level scores and high scores into files so that they can be stored permanently.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void saveLevelScores()
    This method is responsible for saving the individual level scores onto text files so that a permanent list of level scores can be made.
    private void saveLevelScoreToFile​(java.io.Writer writer, int scoreForLevel)
    Method used to save the score of one level to text file.
    void saveTotalScore()
    This method is used to save the final scores permanently into the text file so that a permanent list of high scores can be made.

  • Constructor Details

    • SaveScores

      public SaveScores​(GamePlay gamePlay, HighScore highScore) throws java.io.IOException
      This is the constructor for the SaveScores class.
      Parameters:
      gamePlay - GamePlay object.
      highScore - HighScore object.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - In case the level score files cannot be found.

  • Method Details

    • saveTotalScore

      public void saveTotalScore() throws java.io.IOException
      This method is used to save the final scores permanently into the text file so that a permanent list of high scores can be made.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - In case the file cannot be found in the directory.

    • saveLevelScores

      public void saveLevelScores() throws java.io.IOException
      This method is responsible for saving the individual level scores onto text files so that a permanent list of level scores can be made.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - In case the file is not accessible.

    • saveLevelScoreToFile

      private void saveLevelScoreToFile​(java.io.Writer writer, int scoreForLevel) throws java.io.IOException
      Method used to save the score of one level to text file.
      Parameters:
      writer - The writer of the specific level.
      scoreForLevel - The score to be saved in that file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - In case the file is not accessible.
